name: Lan Yan
desc:
"Spring Woven From Jade" Lan Yan

The brilliant swallow bears branches of joy to fill the home.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Dynamic Skin can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
.
Lustrous Skin can only be purchased after obtaining Dynamic Skin.

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Want to play cards? Sure, I just so happen to be up for a match myself."
<color=#ece5d8>Hint: Lan Yan's deck is built around Shields and excels at wearing down opponents with defensive strategies.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Lan Yan
customize.desc:
"Spring Woven From Jade" Lan Yan

The brilliant swallow bears branches of joy to fill the home.

customize.name: Kuki Shinobu
customize.desc:
"Mender of Tribulations" Kuki Shinobu

Master of all trades, deputy of the oni.

customize.name: Citlali
customize.desc:
"Obsidian Opalstar" Citlali

The vivid night-wind flows, obsidian reflects the heart.

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Lan Yan
customize.desc:
"Spring Woven From Jade" Lan Yan

The brilliant swallow bears branches of joy to fill the home.

customize.name: Dance Vestments Billow Like Rainbow Jade
customize.desc:

"Ills, be gone!"

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: Dance Vestments Billow Like Rainbow Jade
customize.desc:
Lan Yan: Dance Vestments Billow Like Rainbow Jade

"Ills, be gone!"

customize.text:

"Watch out! I'm about to get serious."
<color=#ece5d8>Special Rule: "Lan Yan" begins the match equipped with the Talent Card "Dance Vestments Billow Like Rainbow Jade."</color>

customize.name: Player EXP
customize.desc: Obtained by winning Genius Invokation TCG matches. Every duel you won builds upon the paths to victory, such is the act of earning experience itself. To know how to overcome and subdue the adversary in any situation is the greatest strength that a player can possess.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Create 2 stacks of</color> <color=#ffffff>Swallow-Wisp Shield</color> <color=#ffffffa6>, gain 1 stack of</color> <color=#ffffff>Efficient Switch</color> <color=#ffffffa6>, and deal 1</color> <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> <color=#ffffffa6>. If this Skill triggers Swirl, create 1 additional stack of</color> <color=#ffffff>Swallow-Wisp Shield</color> <color=#ffffffa6>.</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Swallow-Wisp Shield</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Grants</color> <color=#ffffff>1 Shield point</color> <color=#ffffffa6>to your active character. (Can stack, no stack limit)</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Efficient Switch</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>The next time you perform "Switch Character":</color> <color=#ffffffa6>Spend 1 fewer Elemental Die. (Can stack, no stack limit)</color>

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Deals 3</color> <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> <color=#ffffffa6>, creates 2 stacks of</color> <color=#ffffff>Swallow-Wisp Shield</color> <color=#ffffffa6>.</color>
<color=#ece5d8>Swallow-Wisp Shield</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffffa6>Grants</color> <color=#ffffff>1 Shield point</color> <color=#ffffffa6>to your active character. (Can stack, no stack limit)</color>

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing chracters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Swirl:</color> Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target

<color=#ece5d8>Shield</color>
This Shield will be consumed to protect the character who equips it from DMG.

value.name: Dance Vestments Billow Like Rainbow Jade
value.desc:
Lan Yan: Dance Vestments Billow Like Rainbow Jade

"Ills, be gone!"

value.text: Reward for inviting Lan Yan to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Lan Yan
value.desc: A rattan weaver from Chenyu Vale. Clear-minded and well-tempered, she is as lively as a mountain spring.
